# Esna II, 133 {-}



- Location: North-east door, ceiling
- Date: Domitian

#### Text between two vultures wearing red crowns {-}

<div class="col2">

| *Wȝdy.t nb.t P Dp  *
| *dỉ=s nsyw.t ʿȝ.t   *
|   *n zȝ Rʿ  *
|   *(tmtyns nty-ḫwỉ)|  *
|
| Wadjet, lady of Pe and Dep,
| she gives a great kingship 
|    to the son of Re,
|    (Domitian, Augustus)|
  
  
</div>
